ValidationRule.description: Penalty of perjury date has to equal today
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Public_Works" && AND( ISCHANGED(CertifyDate__c), CertifyDate__c <>TODAY()), true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "I certify this on" date must be today's date. Please select today's date.
